channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Git client Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Git client Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-36881|2024-08-03T10:14:29.073Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20client%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git client Plugin 3.11.0 and earlier does not perform SSH host key verification when connecting to Git repositories via SSH, enabling man-in-the-middle attacks.
